Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:1: When the Imminent Event (of Doom) will occur,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:2: there will be no one to deny its occurrence.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:4: when the earth will be jolted with a terrible jolt,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:5: and the mountains will be crumbled a thorough crumbling,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:6: until they will become dust, scattered in the air,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:7: and you will be (divided into) three categories.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:8: As for the People of the Right, how (lucky) are the People of the Right!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:9: And the People of the Left ? How (wretched) are the People of the Left!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:10: And the Foremost are the foremost.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:11: Those are the ones blessed with nearness (to Allah)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:14: and a few from the later ones.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:15: (They will be sitting) on thrones woven with gold,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:16: reclining on them, facing each other.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:17: Immortal boys will rotate around them
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:18: with bowls and jugs and a goblet of pure wine,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:19: from which they will neither suffer headache, nor will they be intoxicated,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:21: and the flesh of birds that they desire.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:22: And (for them there will be) houris, having lovely big eyes,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:23: all (neat and clean) like a hidden pearl,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:24: as a reward for what they used to do.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:25: They will hear neither an absurd talk in it, nor something leading to sin,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:26: but (they will hear) the words of Salām , Salām (as greetings).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:27: And the People of the right? How (lucky) are the People of the Right!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:28: (They will be) amid lote-trees with no thorns,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:29: and the trees of TalH , (banana, or a fragrant tree) having layers one upon the other,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:30: and a shade, spread all over,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:33: neither interrupted (in any season), nor prohibited,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:35: Surely We have made up those females in a special creation,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:37: amorous to their husbands, matching them in age,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:38: for the People of the Right,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:40: and many from the later ones.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:41: And the People of the Left? How (wretched) are the People of the Left!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:42: (They will be) in scorching wind and boiling water,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:43: and in a shade of black smoke,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:46: and used to persist in major sins,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:47: and used to say, “Is it that when we die and become dust-is it that we will be raised again,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:48: and our ancient fathers as well?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:49: Say, “All the earlier and the later ones
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:50: will be gathered together for a fixed time of a specified Day.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:51: Then O you, the erring, the denying people,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:52: you will have to eat from the tree of zaqqūm,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:53: and to fill with it the bellies,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:54: then on top of it you will have to drink boiling water,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:55: and to drink like camels suffering from the disease of over-thirst.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:56: This will be their welcome entertainment on the Day of Requital.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:57: We have created you; then why do you not believe in it?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:58: So, tell Me about the semen you drop (in the wombs):
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:59: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creator?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:60: We have appointed (the times of) death among you, and We cannot be frustrated
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:61: from replacing you with others like you, and creating you (afresh) in that (form) which you do not know.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:62: And you certainly know the first creation; then why do you not take lesson?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:63: Well, tell Me about that (seed) which you sow:
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:64: Is it you who grow it, or are We the One who grows?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:65: If We so will, We can certainly make it crumbled, and you will remain wondering,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:68: Again, tell Me about the water you drink:
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:69: Is it you who have brought it down from the clouds, or are We the One who sends (it) down?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:70: If We so will, We can make it bitter in taste.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:71: Now tell Me about the fire you kindle:
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:72: Is it you who have originated its tree, 5 or are We the Originator?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:73: We have made it a reminder (of Our infinite power, and of the fire of Hell) and a benefit for travelers in deserts.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:74: So, proclaim purity of the name of your Lord, the Magnificent.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:75: So, I swear by the setting places of the stars,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:76: -and indeed it is a great oath, if you are to appreciate-
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:77: it is surely the Noble Qur’ān,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:79: that is not touched except by the purified ones (the angels).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:80: - a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:81: Is it this discourse that you take lightly,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:82: and take your denial as your livelihood?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:83: So why (do you) not (intervene) when the soul (of a dying person) reaches the throat,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:85: And We are closer to him than you, but you do not perceive.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:86: So, if you are not going to be recompensed (in the Hereafter for your deeds), then why do you not
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:87: bring the soul back, if you are truthful?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:88: So, in case he (the dying person) is from among those blessed with nearness,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:89: then (for him) there is comfort and fragrance and garden of bliss.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:90: And in case he is from among the People of the Right,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:91: then, (it will be said to him,) “Peace is for you, as you are one of the People of the Right.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:92: But if he is one of the deniers, the astray,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:93: then (for him) there is entertainment from boiling water,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:95: Indeed this is certainty in its true sense.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 56:96: So, proclaim purity of the name of your Lord, the Magnificent.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:3: there will be no denying its coming to pass,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:6: When the earth is shaken with a violent shock,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:7: and the mountains are pulverised to
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:9: so that they become a scattered dust,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:10: and you will be three kinds:
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:12: — what of those of the right ?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:14: — what of those of the left ?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:16: they are the ones brought near [to God],
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:19: and a few from the later ones
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:21: reclining on them, face to face.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:22: They will be waited on by immortal youths
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:23: with goblets and ewers and a cup from a flowing spring,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:24: wherefrom they suffer no headache nor any stupefaction,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:25: and such fruits as they prefer,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:26: and such flesh of fowls as they desire,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:29: a reward for what they used to do.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:30: They will not hear therein any vain talk or any sinful words,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:33: — what of those of the right ?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:41: Verily We have created them with an
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:47: and a multitude of the later ones.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:49: — what of those of the left ?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:50: Amid a scorching wind and scalding water,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:51: and the shade of pitch-black smoke,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:53: Indeed before that they used to live at ease,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:54: and they used to persist in the great sin.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:55: And they used to say, ‘What! When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we indeed be resurrected?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:57: Say: ‘Truly the former and the later
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:58: will be gathered for the tryst of a known day.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:59: Then indeed you, the erring, the deniers,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:60: will assuredly eat from a Zaqqūm tree
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:62: and drink on top of that boiling water,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:63: drinking like the drinking of thirsty camels’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:64: This will be the hospitality for them on the Day of Judgement.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:67: Have you considered the sperm that you emit?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:68: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creators?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:69: We have ordained death among you, and We are not to be outmanoeuvred from
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:70: replacing [you with] your likes and making you in what you do not know.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:71: For verily you have known the first creation, why then will you not remember?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:72: Have you considered what you sow?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:73: Is it you who make it grow, or are We the Grower?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:74: If We will, We could surely turn it into chaff, and you would remain bemused:
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:77: Have you considered the water you drink?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:78: Is it you who cause it to come down from the
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:79: clouds or are We the Causer of its coming down?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:80: If We willed, We could make it bitter — why then will you not give thanks?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:81: Have you considered the fire that you kindle?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:82: Was it you who created the tree thereof or were We the Creator?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:83: We made it a reminder and a boon for the desert-travellers.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:84: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:85: Nay, I swear by the setting-places of the stars!
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:86: And indeed it is a tremendous oath, if you only knew.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:87: This is indeed a noble Qur’ān,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:89: which none touch except the purified,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:90: a revelation by the Lord of the Worlds.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:91: Do you then belittle this discourse?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:92: And for your livelihood you offer your denial?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:93: Why then, when it reaches the [dying person’s] throat
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:94: and you are at that moment looking,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:95: and We are nearer to him than you are, but you do not perceive —
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:96: why then, if you are not going to face a reckoning,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:97: do you not bring it back, if you are truthful?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:98: Thus if he be of those brought near,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:99: then repose, and a goodly provision, and a garden of Bliss.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:100: And if he be of those of the right ,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:101: then ‘Peace be to you’, [a greeting] from those of the right .
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:102: But if he be of the deniers, the erring,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:103: then a welcome of boiling water,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:105: This indeed is the certain truth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 56:106: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:1: When what is to occur (the Hour of Resurrection) will occur,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:2: There is no falsehood in its occurrence.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:3: (That Hour) will lower (some) and raise (some others) high.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:4: When the earth will tremor and then shake violently,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:5: And the mountains will be crumbled into bits,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:6: Then will become dust particles spread in the air,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:7: And you will be divided into three classes.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:8: So (first) those on the Right Hand; what a class the Right Hand will be!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:9: And (second) those on the Left Hand; (in what miserable plight will be) the Left Hand party!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:10: And (third) the Excellent; (they) are the Foremost.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:11: It is they who will be the ones drawn near (to Allah).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:12: (They will live) in the Gardens of Bliss.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:13: A large group (of those drawn near) will be from the earlier people.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:14: And a small number (amongst them) will be from the later generations.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:15: (Those drawn near) will be on the thrones ornamented with gold,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:16: Reclining there on cushions, face to face.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:17: The serving youths, rapt always in the same state of being, will go round them.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:18: (They will be attending) carrying bowls, ewers and cups filled with (transparent) drink of (nearness) from the free-flowing springs.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:19: By (drinking) this, they will have neither headache nor derangement of senses (and stupefaction).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:20: And (the servants of Paradise) will be (roaming about) with fruits which (the ones drawn near) will like,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:21: And (there will be) bird-meat as well which they (the ones drawn near) will desire.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:22: And also (in their companionship will be) maidens with wide lovely eyes,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:24: (That) will be the reward of the (pious) works which they used to do.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:25: There they will hear nothing absurd nor any word of sin,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:26: But (these people of peace will hear) only one thing (from all sides:) ‘Peace, Peace.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:27: And those of the Right Hand; what a class the Right Hand are!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:32: And (they will be rejoicing) in abundance of fruits.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:33: They will be neither exhausted nor restricted (to eat).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:34: And (they) will be (staying) on raised (splendid) floors.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:35: Surely, We have created these (maidens) as a special creation (reflecting beauty and refinement).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:36: Then We have made them virgins,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:37: The ardently loving (wives) of the same age.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:38: These (maidens and other bounties) are for those on the Right Hand.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:39: A large group of them will be from the earlier people.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:40: And from later generations will (also) be a large group (amongst them).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:41: And those of the Left Hand; what (an evil people) on the Left Hand are!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:42: They will be amid fierce, hot wind of Hell and simmering water,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:43: And under the shadow of black smoke.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:44: That will neither (ever) cool nor be pleasing.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:45: No doubt, these (inmates of Hell) lived luxuriously before this (in the world),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:46: And obstinately persisted in great sin (of denying Allah and setting up partners with Him).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:47: And they used to say: ‘When we are dead and become (a heap of) dust and (decomposed bones), shall we then be raised up (alive again)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:48: And shall our ancestors too (be given life)?’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:49: Say: ‘Indeed, the earlier and the later,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:50: (All of them) will be gathered together on a fixed Hour of an appointed Day.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:51: Then surely, O strayed people, deniers,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:52: You will certainly eat of thorny (cactus) tree,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:53: And will fill your stomachs with it.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:54: And (you) will drink boiling water over it,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:55: Drinking as a thirst-stricken camel drinks.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:56: This will be their feast on the Day of Resurrection.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:57: It is We Who created you.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:58: Well, give your view: the semen (sperm drop) that you ejaculate (into the womb)—
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:59: Is it you who create (a human being) from it, or are We the Creator?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:60: It is We Who have decreed death amongst you, and We are not helpless either (to bring you back to life after this).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:61: Nor are We (powerless) to change others into the like of you in your place and make you grow into a form which you do not know.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:62: And surely, you have learnt (the reality of) the first creation.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:63: Well, give your view: the (seed) that you cultivate—
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:64: Is it you who make (the crop) grow from it, or are We its Grower?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:65: If We so intend, We would crumble it to pieces.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:66: (And you may say:) ‘We are punished with ransom;
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:67: Rather we are seized by misfortune.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:68: Well, give your view: the water that you drink—
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:69: Have you sent it down from the cloud, or are We its Sender?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:70: If We will, We can make it bitter.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:71: Well, give your view: the fire that you kindle—
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:72: Have you grown its tree, or are We its Grower?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:73: It is We Who have made it (the fire of tree) a reminder (of the Fire of Hell, an admonition and a warning) and a source of profit and comfort for the travellers in forests.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:74: So always glorify the Name of your Lord, Most Magnificent.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:75: So I swear by the places where different portions of the Qur’an descend (on the Arab Messenger).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:76: And this is a mighty oath if you realize.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:77: Surely, this is a Glorious Qur’an (which is being sent down on the most Glorious Messenger [blessings and peace be upon him]).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:78: It has been (inscribed) in al-Lawh al-Mahfuz (the Preserved Tablet) before this.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:79: No one can touch it except the purified (and cleansed) ones.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:80: It has been sent down by the Lord of all the worlds.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:81: So is it this Revelation that you disdain?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:82: And you have made your means of subsistence (and fortune) to reject it!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:83: Then why do you not (make the soul return) when it reaches the throat (to pass away)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:84: And at that moment, you do nothing but helplessly look on!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:85: And We are nearer to him (the dying one) than you but you do not see (Us).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:86: Then if you are under no one’s command and control, why do you not (do this),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:87: That you turn that soul back if you are truthful?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:88: Then if he (who died) was of those drawn near,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:89: For him is Paradise packed with bounties, pleasure and delight and spiritual sustenance and comforts.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:90: And if he was of those on the Right Hand,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:91: Then (it will be said to him:) ‘Peace for you from those on the Right Hand! (Or, O Prophet, peace on you from those on the Right Hand!)’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:92: But if he (who died) was of the strayed beliers,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:93: Then he will be entertained with scalding, boiling water.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:94: And his (end) is the admission to Hell.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:95: Assuredly, this is the absolute truth of certitude.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 56:96: So always glorify the Name of your Lord, Most Magnificent.

null.verse 56:2: ei ole ketään, joka voisi sen kieltää.
null.verse 56:3: Se alentaa ja ylentää,
null.verse 56:4: kun maa vapisee ankarasti,
null.verse 56:5: ja vuoret murtuvat sirpaleiksi,
null.verse 56:6: niin että niistä tulee kuin hajoitettua tomua,
null.verse 56:7: ja teitä tulee olemaan kolmea laatua.
null.verse 56:8: Ensiksi ne, jotka ovat oikealla; ketkä ovat ne onnelliset, jotka ovat oikealla puolella?
null.verse 56:9: Ja ne, jotka ovat vasemmalla; ketkä ovat ne onnettomat, jotka ovat vasemmalla puolella?
null.verse 56:10: Ja ensimmäiset pysyvät ensimmäisinä.
null.verse 56:13: suuret joukot niitä, jotka aikaisemmin liittyivät profeettaan,
null.verse 56:14: mutta vain pieni määrä myöhemmin liittyneitä.
null.verse 56:15: Siellä he saavat levätä kultakuteisilla istuimilla
null.verse 56:16: toinen toistaan vastapäätä,
null.verse 56:17: ikuisesti nuoret pojat palvelevat heitä,
null.verse 56:18: pikarit, haarikat ja maljat täynnä puhdasta juomaa,
null.verse 56:19: josta he eivät saa päänkipua eivätkä päihdy,
null.verse 56:20: tarjoten hedelmiä, jotka ovat heille mieluisia,
null.verse 56:21: ja linnunlihaa, aivan heidän toivonsa mukaan.
null.verse 56:22: Siellä on kaunosilmäisiä sulottaria,
null.verse 56:24: palkaksi siitä, mitä he ovat tehneet.
null.verse 56:25: Siellä he eivät saa kuulla turhaa eivätkä syntistä puhetta,
null.verse 56:27: Entä ne, jotka ovat oikealla; keitä ovat ne, jotka ovat oikealla puolella?
null.verse 56:28: He ovat lootuspuiden keskellä, puiden, joissa ei ole okaa,
null.verse 56:29: ja banaanien, joissa on terttu tertun päällä.
null.verse 56:33: jotka eivät vähene ja joita ei heiltä evätä
null.verse 56:35: Totisesti olemme luonut heidät omin käsin
null.verse 56:38: niitä varten, jotka ovat oikealla puolella,
null.verse 56:39: joista lukuisat kuuluivat aikaisimpiin profeetan kannattajiin,
null.verse 56:41: Entä ne, jotka ovat vasemmalla; keitä raukkoja ovat ne, jotka ovat vasemmalla puolella?
null.verse 56:42: Heitä tukahduttavat kuumat tuulet ja polttaa kiehuva vesi
null.verse 56:44: joka ei tuo vilvoitusta eikä virkistystä.
null.verse 56:45: Aikanaan elivät he totisesti yltäkylläisyydessä,
null.verse 56:46: paatuen suurissa synneissään
null.verse 56:47: sanoen toisilleen: »Kun olemme kuolleet ja meistä on tullut tomua ja luita, herätetäänkö meidät todella kuolleista,
null.verse 56:49: Sano: »Sekä edelliset että jälkimmäiset
null.verse 56:50: kootaan yhteen määrättynä hetkenä ja päivänä.
null.verse 56:51: Te harhapoluille joutuneet, jotka selititte totuuden valheeksi,
null.verse 56:52: totisesti te saatte silloin syödä Zakkuum-puuta
null.verse 56:53: ja täyttää vatsanne sillä,
null.verse 56:54: juoda kiehuvaa vettä sen päälle,
null.verse 56:55: juoda niinkuin janoiset kameelit.
null.verse 56:56: Tässä on heidän kestityksensä tuomiopäivänä.
null.verse 56:57: Me olemme luonut teidät, miksi siis ette tunnusta sitä totuudeksi?
null.verse 56:58: Oletteko ajatelleet siementä, joka antoi teille elämän?
null.verse 56:59: Loitteko te sen vai Mekö olemme sen luonut?
null.verse 56:60: Me olemme asettanut teille kuoleman, eikä mikään estä Meitä
null.verse 56:61: luomasta sijaanne toisenlaisia olentoja, antamalla teille muodon, jota ette tunne.
null.verse 56:62: Olette totisesti tulleet tuntemaan ensimmäisen luomisen, miksi ette ota kehoitusta varteen?
null.verse 56:63: Oletteko ajatelleet kylvöänne?
null.verse 56:64: Tekö saatte sen kasvamaan, vai Mekö sen aikaansaamme?
null.verse 56:65: Jos Me tahtoisimme, voisimme muuttaa sen kuivuneiksi korsiksi, niin että te ihmettelisitte kokonaisen päivän ja sanoisitte:
null.verse 56:67: niin - meillä ei ole mitään.
null.verse 56:68: Mitä ajattelette vedestä, jota juotte?
null.verse 56:69: Tekö sen vuodatatte alas pilvistä, vai Mekö sen teemme?
null.verse 56:70: Jos tahtoisimme, voisimme tehdä sen suolaiseksi; miksi siis ette ole kiitollisia?
null.verse 56:71: Mitä ajattelette tulesta, jonka sytytätte?
null.verse 56:72: Tekö olette kasvattaneet puun sitä varten, vai Mekö olemme sen kasvattanut?
null.verse 56:73: Me olemme asettanut puut erämaan vaeltajalle kehoitukseksi ja hyödyksi.
null.verse 56:74: Ylistä siis suuren Herrasi nimeä,
null.verse 56:75: Vannon tähtien aseman nimeen,
null.verse 56:76: ja se on totisesti suuri vala, jospa sen tietäisitte,
null.verse 56:79: Sitä saavat koskettaa vain puhtaat.
null.verse 56:80: Sen lähetti maailmojen Herra.
null.verse 56:81: Tahdotteko sittenkin halveksia tätä Kirjaa
null.verse 56:82: ja aivan kuin elinkeinoksenne väittää sitä valheeksi?
null.verse 56:83: Mutta kun sielu, henkenne ruumiista paetessa, nousee kurkkuun
null.verse 56:84: ja te silloin katselette kuolemaa,
null.verse 56:85: - vaikka olemmehan Me lähempänä kuolevaa kuin te, teidän sitä kuitenkaan näkemättä -
null.verse 56:86: miksi ette te, jotka kiellätte riippuvaisuutenne Jumalasta,
null.verse 56:87: voi silloin torjua sitä kääntymään takaisin, jos totta puhutte?
null.verse 56:88: Jos kuoleva kuuluu niihin, jotka pääsevät lähelle Jumalaa,
null.verse 56:89: tulee hänen osakseen onni, kukkien tuoksu ja autuuden puutarhat.
null.verse 56:90: Jos hän on niitä, jotka joutuvat oikealle puolelle,
null.verse 56:91: on hänen osansa: »Rauha olkoon sinulla ja niillä, jotka ovat oikealla puolella!»
null.verse 56:92: Mutta jos hän kuuluu niihin, jotka väittävät totuutta valheeksi, ja kulkee harhateitä,
null.verse 56:93: on hänen tervetuliaismaljansa kiehuvaa vettä
null.verse 56:95: Tämä on totisesti varma totuus.
null.verse 56:96: Ylistä siis Herrasi nimeä, suuren.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:2: nul ne pourra nier sa venue.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:4: Lorsque la terre sera ébranlée violemment,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:5: que les montagnes voleront en éclats
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:8: Il y aura les compagnons de la droite.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:9: Et les compagnons de la gauche.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:10: Et ceux qui devancent, ceux qui devancent,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:11: ceux-là sont les plus proches [de Dieu],
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:13: Ils seront très nombreux parmi les premières générations
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:14: et peu nombreux parmi les dernières,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:15: étendus sur des lits de repos,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:17: Des éphèbes immortels circuleront autour d'eux
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:18: portant des cratères, des aiguières et des coupes remplies d'un breuvage limpide
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:19: qui ne leur causera ni torpeur ni ébriété,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:20: offrant les fruits de leur choix
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:21: et la chair d'oiseaux selon leur bon plaisir.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:22: Il y aura des houris aux grands yeux,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:24: en récompense de leurs oeuvres passées.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:25: Ils n'entendront là ni discours futile, ni critique injurieuse,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:27: Et les compagnons de la droite ! Qui sont donc les compagnons de la droite ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:28: Ils séjourneront parmi des jujubiers sans épines
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:29: et des bananiers porteurs de régimes,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:34: se reposant sur des lits élevés.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:35: En vérité, Nous avons donné aux houris une forme parfaite.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:38: pour les compagnons de la droite,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:39: qui seront très nombreux parmi les premières générations
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:40: et très nombreux parmi les dernières.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:41: Et les compagnons de la gauche ! Qui sont donc les compagnons de la gauche ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:42: Ils seront exposés à un vent brûlant et à une eau bouillante,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:45: Ils vivaient auparavant dans le luxe
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:46: et persistaient à commettre les pires forfaits,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:47: disant : " Lorsque nous serons morts, que nous serons poussière et ossements, seronsnous vraiment ressuscités,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:49: Dis : " En vérité, ceux des premiers et ceux des derniers temps
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:50: seront réunis à un moment fixé d'un jour connu ".
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:51: Alors vraiment, vous, les égarés, les négateurs,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:52: vous mangerez les fruits de l'arbre Zaqqoum ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:53: vous vous en emplirez le ventre ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:54: vous boirez ensuite de l'eau bouillante ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:55: vous boirez comme des chameaux altérés.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:56: Tel sera leur partage le Jour du Jugement.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:57: C'est Nous qui vous avons créés.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:58: Ne voyez-vous pas ce que vous éjaculez ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:59: Est-ce vous qui créez cela, ou est-ce Nous qui créons ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:60: Nous avons décrété que la mort survienne parmi vous, et nul ne saurait Nous devancer,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:61: afin de vous remplacer par des êtres semblables à vous et de vous transformer en ce que vous ne savez pas.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:62: Vous connaissez certainement la première naissance ; pourquoi donc ne réfléchissezvous pas ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:63: Avez-vous considéré ce que vous cultivez ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:64: Est-ce vous qui le faites croître, ou est-ce Nous ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:65: Si Nous le voulions, Nous en ferions de la paille sèche et vous ne cesseriez pas vos récriminations :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:67: pire, nous sommes privés de tout ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:68: Avez-vous considéré l'eau que vous buvez ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:69: Est-ce vous qui l'avez fait descendre des nuages ? Ou est-ce Nous qui la faisons descendre ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:70: Si Nous le voulions, Nous la rendrions saumâtre.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:71: Avez-vous considéré le feu que vous obtenez par frottement ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:72: Est-ce vous qui en avez produit le bois, ou est-ce Nous qui le produisons ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:73: Nous l'avons fait pour qu'il soit un rappel et une chose utile pour les voyageurs du désert.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:74: Glorifie donc le Nom de ton Seigneur, le Magnifique !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:75: J'en jure par le coucher des étoiles,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:76: et c'est là - si vous pouviez le savoir - un serment solennel :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:77: voici, en vérité, un noble Coran,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:79: Ne doivent le toucher que ceux qui sont en état de pureté.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:80: C'est une révélation du Seigneur des mondes !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:81: Allez-vous tenir en suspicion un tel discours
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:82: et vous nourrir de dénégations portées contre lui ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:83: Pourquoi, au moment où l'âme remonte à la gorge d'un mourant,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:84: où vous êtes présents à le regarder
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:85: et où Nous sommes plus près de lui que vous sans que vous le remarquiez,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:86: pourquoi donc , si vous-mêmes n'avez pas à comparaître en jugement,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:87: ne feriez-vous pas revenir cette âme, si vous êtes véridiques ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:88: Si cet homme comptait parmi les proches de Dieu,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:89: il jouira du repos, des parfums et des jardins du délice ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:90: et s'il comptait parmi les compagnons de la droite,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:91: alors : " Paix à toi ! " disent les compagnons de la droite ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:92: mais s'il était du nombre des négateurs dévoyés,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 56:96: Glorifie donc le Nom de ton Seigneur, le Magnifique ! certaine.

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:2: nul ne traitera sa venue de mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:3: Il abaissera (les uns), il élèvera (les autres).
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:4: Quand la terre sera secouée violemment,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:5: et les montagnes seront réduites en miettes,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:8: les gens de la droite - que sont les gens de la droite ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:9: Et les gens de la gauche - que sont les gens de la gauche ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:10: Les premiers (à suivre les ordres de Dieu sur la terre) ce sont eux qui seront les premiers (dans l’au-delà)
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:11: Ce sont ceux-là les plus rapprochés de Dieu
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:13: une multitude d’élus parmi les premières ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:14: et un petit nombre parmi les dernières ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:15: sur des lits ornés [d’or et de pierreries],
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:16: s’y accoudant et se faisant face.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:17: Parmi eux circuleront des garçons éternellement jeunes,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:18: avec des coupes, des aiguières et un verre :
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:20: qui ne leur provoquera ni maux de tête ni étourdissement;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:21: et des fruits de leur choix,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:22: et toute chair d’oiseau qu’ils désireront.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:23: Et ils auront des houris aux yeux, grands et beaux,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:24: pareilles à des perles en coquille.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:25: en récompense pour ce qu’ils faisaient.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:26: Ils n’y entendront ni futilité ni blasphème;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:28: Et les gens de la droite; que sont les gens de la droite ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:29: [Ils seront parmi]: des jujubiers sans épines,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:30: et parmi des bananiers aux régimes bien fournis,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:37: C’est Nous qui les avons créées à la perfection,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:38: et Nous les avons faites vierges,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:40: pour les gens de la droite,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:41: une multitude d’élus parmi les premières ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:42: et une multitude d’élus parmi les dernières ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:43: Et les gens de la gauche; que sont les gens de la gauche ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:44: ils seront au milieu d’un souffle brûlant et d’une eau bouillante,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:47: Ils vivaient auparavant dans le luxe.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:48: Ils persistaient dans le grand péché [le polythéisme]
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:49: et disaient : «Quand nous mourrons et serons poussière et ossements, serons-nous ressuscités ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:51: Dis : «En vérité les premiers et les derniers
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:52: seront réunis pour le rendez-vous d’un jour connu».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:53: Et puis, vous, les égarés, qui traitiez (la Résurrection) de mensonge,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:54: vous mangerez certainement d’un arbre de Zaqqoum.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:55: Vous vous en remplirez le ventre,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:56: puis vous boirez par-dessus cela de l’eau bouillante,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:57: vous en boirez comme boivent les chameaux assoiffés.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:58: Voilà le repas d’accueil qui leur sera servi, au jour de la Rétribution.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:59: C’est Nous qui vous avons créés.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:60: Voyez-vous donc ce que vous éjaculez :
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:61: est-ce vous qui le créez ou :
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:63: Nous avons prédéterminé la mort parmi vous.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:64: de vous remplacer par vos semblables, et vous faire renaître dans [un état] que vous ne savez pas.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:65: Vous avez connu la première création.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:66: Voyez-vous donc ce que vous labourez ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:67: Est-ce vous qui le cultivez ? ou
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:69: Si Nous voulions, Nous le réduirions en débris.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:72: Voyez-vous donc l’eau que vous buvez ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:73: Est-ce vous qui l’avez fait descendre du nuage ? ou
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:75: Si Nous voulions, Nous la rendrions salée.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:76: Voyez-vous donc le feu que vous obtenez par frottement ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:77: Est-ce vous qui avez créé son arbre ou
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:79: Nous en avons fait un rappel (de l’Enfer), et un élément utile pour ceux qui en ont besoin .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:80: Glorifie donc le nom de ton Seigneur, le Très Grand !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:82: Et c’est vraiment un serment solennel, si vous saviez.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:83: Et c’est certainement un Coran noble,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:86: C’est une révélation de la part du Seigneur de l’Univers.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:87: Est-ce ce discours-là que vous traitez de mensonge ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:88: Et est-ce pour vous [une façon d’être reconnaissant] à votre subsistance que de traiter (le Coran) de mensonge ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:89: Lorsque le souffle de la vie remonte à la gorge (d’un moribond),
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:90: et qu’à ce moment là vous regardez,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:91: et que Nous sommes plus proche de lui que vous [qui l’entourez] mais vous ne
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:93: Pourquoi donc, si vous croyez que vous n’avez pas de compte à rendre,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:94: ne la faites-vous pas revenir [cette âme], si vous êtes véridiques ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:95: Si celui-ci est du nombre des rapprochés (de Dieu),
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:96: alors (il aura) du repos, de la grâce et un Jardin de délices.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:97: Et s’il est du nombre des gens de la droite,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:98: il sera [accueilli par ces mots]: «Paix à toi» de la part des gens de la droite.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:99: Et s’il est de ceux qui avaient traité de mensonge (la résurrection) et s’étaient égarés,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:100: alors, il sera installé dans une eau bouillante,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:101: et il brûlera dans la Fournaise.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 56:103: Glorifie donc le nom de ton Seigneur, le Très Grand ! certitude.

null.verse 56:2: Es gibt nichts, das sein Eintreffen verhindern könnte -,
null.verse 56:3: Dann wird es (die einen) erniedrigen, (andere) wird es erhöhen.
null.verse 56:4: Wenn die Erde heftig erschüttert wird,
null.verse 56:5: Und die Berge gänzlich zertrümmert werden,
null.verse 56:6: Dann sollen sie zu Staub werden, weithin verstreutem,
null.verse 56:7: Und ihr sollt in drei Ränge (gestellt) werden:
null.verse 56:8: Die zur Rechten - was (wißt ihr) von denen, die zur Rechten sein werden? -,
null.verse 56:9: Die zur Linken - was (wißt ihr) von denen, die zur Linken sein werden? -,
null.verse 56:10: Die Vordersten werden die Vordersten sein;
null.verse 56:11: Das sind die, die (Gott) nahe sein werden
null.verse 56:15: Auf durchwobenen Polstern,
null.verse 56:16: Lehnend auf diesen, einander gegenüber.
null.verse 56:17: Ihnen aufwarten werden Jünglinge, die nicht altern,
null.verse 56:18: Mit Bechern und Krügen und Trinkschalen (gefüllt) aus einem fließenden Born -
null.verse 56:19: Keinen Kopfschmerz werden sie davon haben, noch werden sie berauscht sein -
null.verse 56:20: Und (mit den) Früchten, die sie vorziehen,
null.verse 56:21: Und Fleisch vom Geflügel, das sie begehren mögen,
null.verse 56:22: Und holdselige Mädchen mit großen, herrlichen Augen,
null.verse 56:24: Als eine Belohnung für das, was sie zu tun pflegten.
null.verse 56:25: Sie werden dort kein eitles Geschwätz noch sündige Rede hören,
null.verse 56:27: Und die zur Rechten - was (wißt ihr) von denen, die zur Rechten sein werden? -,
null.verse 56:28: (Sie werden) unter dornenlosen Lotusbäumen (sein)
null.verse 56:33: Unaufhörlichen, unverbotenen.
null.verse 56:35: Wir haben sie als eine wunderbare Schöpfung erschaffen
null.verse 56:39: Eine große Schar der Früheren,
null.verse 56:40: Und eine große Schar der Späteren.
null.verse 56:41: Und die zur Linken - was (wißt ihr) von denen, die zur Linken sein werden? -,
null.verse 56:42: (Sie werden) inmitten von glühenden Winden und siedendem Wasser (sein)
null.verse 56:44: Weder kühl noch erfrischend.
null.verse 56:45: Vor diesem waren sie in der Tat verbraucht durch Üppigkeit
null.verse 56:46: Und verharrten in der großen Sünde.
null.verse 56:47: Und sie pflegten zu sprechen: «Wie! wenn wir tot sind und zu Staub und Gebeine geworden, sollen wir dann wirklich auferweckt werden?
null.verse 56:49: Sprich: «Die Früheren und die Späteren
null.verse 56:50: Werden alle versammelt werden zur gesetzten Frist eines bestimmten Tags.
null.verse 56:51: Dann, o ihr Irregegangenen und Leugner,
null.verse 56:52: Essen sollt ihr vom Baume Saqqüm,
null.verse 56:53: Und damit die Bäuche füllen,
null.verse 56:54: Und darauf von siedendem Wasser trinken,
null.verse 56:55: Trinkend wie die durstigen Kamele trinken.
null.verse 56:56: Das wird ihre Bewirtung sein am Tage des Gerichts.
null.verse 56:57: Wir haben euch erschaffen.
null.verse 56:58: Habt ihr betrachtet, was ihr ausspritzt?
null.verse 56:59: Schafft ihr es oder sind Wir die Schöpfer?
null.verse 56:60: Wir haben bei euch den Tod verordnet, und Wir können nicht daran verhindert werden,
null.verse 56:61: Daß Wir an eure Stelle andere bringen gleich euch und daß Wir euch in einen Zustand entwickeln, den ihr nicht kennt.
null.verse 56:62: Und ihr kennet doch gewiß die erste Schöpfung.
null.verse 56:63: Habt ihr betrachtet, was ihr aussäet?
null.verse 56:64: Seid ihr es, die ihr es wachsen lasset, oder lassen Wir es wachsen?
null.verse 56:65: Wollten Wir es, Wir könnten es alles in Staub verwandeln, dann würdet ihr nicht aufhören, euch zu beklagen:
null.verse 56:67: Nein, wir sind beraubt.
null.verse 56:68: Habt ihr das Wasser betrachtet, das ihr trinkt?
null.verse 56:69: Seid ihr es, die ihr es aus den Wolken niedersendet, oder sind Wir die Sendenden?
null.verse 56:70: Wollten Wir es, Wir könnten es bitter machen.
null.verse 56:71: Habt ihr das Feuer betrachtet, das ihr zündet?
null.verse 56:72: Seid ihr es, die ihr den Baum dazu hervorbrachtet, oder sind Wir die Schöpfer?
null.verse 56:73: Wir haben ihn zur Ermahnung erschaffen und zum Nutzen für die Wanderer durch Wildernisse.
null.verse 56:74: Drum preise den Namen deines Herrn, des Großen.
null.verse 56:75: Ich schwöre beim Herabschießen der Sterne -
null.verse 56:76: Und fürwahr, das ist ein großer Schwur, wenn ihr es nur wüßtet -,
null.verse 56:77: Daß dies wahrlich ein erhabener Koran ist,
null.verse 56:79: Keiner kann es berühren, außer den Gereinigten -
null.verse 56:80: Eine Offenbarung vom Herrn der Welten.
null.verse 56:81: Und ihr wolltet gegenüber dieser (göttlichen) Verkündigung scheinheilig sein?
null.verse 56:82: Und daß ihr (sie) leugnet, macht ihr das zu eurem täglichen Brot?
null.verse 56:83: Warum wohl, wenn (die Seele des Sterbenden) zur Kehle steigt
null.verse 56:84: Und ihr in jenem Augenblick zuschaut -
null.verse 56:85: Und Wir sind ihm näher als ihr, nur daß ihr nicht sehet -,
null.verse 56:86: Warum wohl, wenn ihr nicht zur Rechenschaft gezogen werden sollt,
null.verse 56:87: Zwingt ihr sie nicht zurück, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid?
null.verse 56:88: Wenn er nun zu denen gehört, die (Gott) nahe sind,
null.verse 56:89: Dann (wird er) Glück (genießen) und Duft (der Seligkeit) und einen Garten der Wonne.
null.verse 56:90: Und wenn er zu denen gehört, die zur Rechten sind,
null.verse 56:91: (Wird ihm ein) «Friede sei mit dir, der du zu denen zur Rechten gehörst!»
null.verse 56:92: Wenn er aber zu den Leugnern, Irregegangenen gehört,
null.verse 56:93: Dann (wird ihm) eine Bewirtung mit siedendem Wasser
null.verse 56:95: Wahrlich, dies ist die Wahrheit selbst.
null.verse 56:96: Lobpreise darum den Namen deines Herrn, des Großen.

null.verse 56:2: terjadinya kiamat itu tidak dapat didustakan (disangkal).
null.verse 56:3: (Kejadian itu) merendahkan (satu golongan) dan meninggikan (golongan yang lain),
null.verse 56:4: apabila bumi digoncangkan sedahsyat-dahsyatnya,
null.verse 56:5: dan gunung-gunung dihancur luluhkan sehancur-hancurnya,
null.verse 56:6: maka jadilah dia debu yang beterbangan,
null.verse 56:7: dan kamu menjadi tiga golongan.
null.verse 56:8: Yaitu golongan kanan.
null.verse 56:9: Dan golongan kiri.
null.verse 56:10: Dan orang-orang yang paling dahulu beriman, merekalah yang paling dulu (masuk surga).
null.verse 56:11: Mereka itulah orang yang didekatkan (kepada Allah).
null.verse 56:13: Segolongan besar dari orang-orang yang terdahulu,
null.verse 56:14: dan segolongan kecil dari orang-orang yang kemudian.
null.verse 56:15: Mereka berada di atas dipan yang bertahtakan emas dan permata,
null.verse 56:16: seraya bertelekan di atasnya berhadap-hadapan.
null.verse 56:17: Mereka dikelilingi oleh anak-anak muda yang tetap muda,
null.verse 56:18: dengan membawa gelas, cerek dan sloki (piala) berisi minuman yang diambil dari air yang mengalir,
null.verse 56:19: mereka tidak pening karenanya dan tidak pula mabuk,
null.verse 56:20: dan buah-buahan dari apa yang mereka pilih,
null.verse 56:21: dan daging burung dari apa yang mereka inginkan.
null.verse 56:22: Dan (di dalam surga itu) ada bidadari-bidadari yang bermata jeli,
null.verse 56:24: Sebagai balasan bagi apa yang telah mereka kerjakan.
null.verse 56:25: Mereka tidak mendengar di dalamnya perkataan yang sia-sia dan tidak pula perkataan yang menimbulkan dosa,
null.verse 56:26: akan tetapi mereka mendengar ucapan salam.
null.verse 56:27: Dan golongan kanan, alangkah bahagianya golongan kanan itu.
null.verse 56:28: Berada di antara pohon bidara yang tidak berduri,
null.verse 56:33: yang tidak berhenti (buahnya) dan tidak terlarang mengambilnya,
null.verse 56:34: dan kasur-kasur yang tebal lagi empuk.
null.verse 56:35: Sesungguhnya Kami menciptakan mereka (bidadari-bidadari) dengan langsung,
null.verse 56:36: dan Kami jadikan mereka gadis-gadis perawan,
null.verse 56:39: (yaitu) segolongan besar dari orang-orang yang terdahulu,
null.verse 56:40: dan segolongan besar pula dari orang yang kemudian.
null.verse 56:41: Dan golongan kiri, siapakah golongan kiri itu.
null.verse 56:42: Dalam (siksaan) angin yang amat panas dan air yang panas yang mendidih,
null.verse 56:43: dan dalam naungan asap yang hitam.
null.verse 56:44: Tidak sejuk dan tidak menyenangkan.
null.verse 56:45: Sesungguhnya mereka sebelum itu hidup bermewah-mewah.
null.verse 56:46: Dan mereka terus-menerus mengerjakan dosa yang besar.
null.verse 56:47: Dan mereka selalu mengatakan: "Apakah apabila kami mati dan menjadi tanah dan tulang belulang, apakah sesungguhnya kami benar-benar akan dibangkitkan kembali?,
null.verse 56:48: apakah bapak-bapak kami yang terdahulu (dibangkitkan pula)?"
null.verse 56:49: Katakanlah: "Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang terdahulu dan orang-orang yang terkemudian,
null.verse 56:50: benar-benar akan dikumpulkan di waktu tertentu pada hari yang dikenal.
null.verse 56:51: Kemudian sesungguhnya kamu hai orang yang sesat lagi mendustakan,
null.verse 56:52: benar-benar akan memakan pohon zaqqum,
null.verse 56:53: dan akan memenuhi perutmu dengannya.
null.verse 56:54: Sesudah itu kamu akan meminum air yang sangat panas.
null.verse 56:55: Maka kamu minum seperti unta yang sangat haus minum.
null.verse 56:56: Itulah hidangan untuk mereka pada hari Pembalasan".
null.verse 56:57: Kami telah menciptakan kamu, maka mengapa kamu tidak membenarkan (hari berbangkit)?
null.verse 56:58: Maka terangkanlah kepadaku tentang nutfah yang kamu pancarkan.
null.verse 56:59: Kamukah yang menciptakannya, atau Kami kah yang menciptakannya?
null.verse 56:60: Kami telah menentukan kematian di antara kamu dan Kami sekali-kali, tidak dapat dikalahkan,
null.verse 56:61: untuk menggantikan kamu dengan orang-orang yang seperti kamu (dalam dunia) dan menciptakan kamu kelak (di akhirat) dalam keadaan yang tidak kamu ketahui.
null.verse 56:62: Dan sesungguhnya kamu telah mengetahui penciptaan yang pertama, maka mengapakah kamu tidak mengambil pelajaran (untuk penciptaan yang kedua)?
null.verse 56:63: Maka terangkanlah kepadaku tentang yang kamu tanam?
null.verse 56:64: Kamukah yang menumbuhkannya ataukah Kami yang menumbuhkannya?
null.verse 56:65: Kalau Kami kehendaki, benar-benar Kami jadikan dia kering dan hancur; maka jadilah kamu heran tercengang.
null.verse 56:67: bahkan kami menjadi orang yang tidak mendapat hasil apa-apa.
null.verse 56:68: Maka terangkanlah kepadaku tentang air yang kamu minum.
null.verse 56:69: Kamukah yang menurunkannya dari awan ataukah Kami yang menurunkan?
null.verse 56:70: Kalau Kami kehendaki niscaya Kami jadikan dia asin, maka mengapakah kamu tidak bersyukur?
null.verse 56:71: Maka terangkanlah kepadaku tentang api yang kamu nyalakan (dari gosokan-gosokan kayu).
null.verse 56:72: Kamukah yang menjadikan kayu itu atau Kami-kah yang menjadikannya?
null.verse 56:73: Kami menjadikan api itu untuk peringatan dan bahan yang berguna bagi musafir di padang pasir.
null.verse 56:74: Maka bertasbihlah dengan (menyebut) nama Tuhanmu yang Maha Besar.
null.verse 56:75: Maka Aku bersumpah dengan tempat beredarnya bintang-bintang.
null.verse 56:76: Sesungguhnya sumpah itu adalah sumpah yang besar kalau kamu mengetahui,
null.verse 56:77: sesungguhnya Al Qur'an ini adalah bacaan yang sangat mulia,
null.verse 56:79: tidak menyentuhnya kecuali hamba-hamba yang disucikan.
null.verse 56:80: Diturunkan dari Tuhan semesta alam.
null.verse 56:81: Maka apakah kamu menganggap remeh saja Al Qur'an ini?,
null.verse 56:82: kamu (mengganti) rezeki (yang Allah berikan) dengan mendustakan (Allah).
null.verse 56:83: Maka mengapa ketika nyawa sampai di kerongkongan,
null.verse 56:84: padahal kamu ketika itu melihat,
null.verse 56:85: dan Kami lebih dekat kepadanya daripada kamu.
null.verse 56:86: maka mengapa jika kamu tidak dikuasai (oleh Allah)?
null.verse 56:87: Kamu tidak mengembalikan nyawa itu (kepada tempatnya) jika kamu adalah orang-orang yang benar?,
null.verse 56:88: adapun jika dia (orang yang mati) termasuk orang yang didekatkan (kepada Allah),
null.verse 56:89: maka dia memperoleh ketenteraman dan rezeki serta surga kenikmatan.
null.verse 56:90: Dan adapun jika dia termasuk golongan kanan,
null.verse 56:91: maka keselamatan bagimu karena kamu dari golongan kanan.
null.verse 56:92: Dan adapun jika dia termasuk golongan orang yang mendustakan lagi sesat,
null.verse 56:93: maka dia mendapat hidangan air yang mendidih,
null.verse 56:95: Sesungguhnya (yang disebutkan ini) adalah suatu keyakinan yang benar.
null.verse 56:96: Maka bertasbihlah dengan (menyebut) nama Tuhanmu Yang Maha Besar.

null.verse 56:2: la cui venuta nessuno potrà negare,
null.verse 56:3: abbasserà [qualcuno e altri] innalzerà!
null.verse 56:4: Quando la terra sarà agitata da una scossa,
null.verse 56:5: e le montagne sbriciolate
null.verse 56:6: saranno polvere dispersa,
null.verse 56:7: sarete allora
null.verse 56:8: in tre gruppi:
null.verse 56:9: i compagni della destra .
null.verse 56:10: i compagni della sinistra .
null.verse 56:15: pochi tra i recenti,
null.verse 56:16: su divani rivestiti d'oro,
null.verse 56:17: sdraiati gli uni di fronte agli altri.
null.verse 56:18: Vagheranno tra loro fanciulli di eterna giovinezza,
null.verse 56:20: coppe, brocche e calici di bevanda sorgiva,
null.verse 56:21: che non darà mal di testa né ebbrezza;
null.verse 56:22: e i frutti che sceglieranno,
null.verse 56:23: e le carni d'uccello che desidereranno.
null.verse 56:24: E [ci saranno colà] le fanciulle dai grandi occhi neri,
null.verse 56:25: simili a perle nascoste,
null.verse 56:26: compenso per quel che avranno fatto.
null.verse 56:27: Colà non sentiranno né vaniloqui né oscenità,
null.verse 56:28: ma solo « Pace, Pace ».
null.verse 56:29: E i compagni della destra; chi sono i compagni della destra?
null.verse 56:32: e banani dai caschi ben colmi ,
null.verse 56:33: tra ombra costante,
null.verse 56:35: e frutti abbondanti,
null.verse 56:39: le abbiamo fatte vergini,
null.verse 56:41: per i compagni della destra.
null.verse 56:42: Molti tra gli antichi,
null.verse 56:43: e molti tra gli ultimi venuti.
null.verse 56:44: E i compagni della sinistra, chi sono i compagni della sinistra?
null.verse 56:45: [saranno esposti a] un vento bruciante, all'acqua bollente,
null.verse 56:46: all'ombra di un fumo nero
null.verse 56:47: non fresca, non piacevole.
null.verse 56:49: e persistevano nel grande peccato
null.verse 56:50: e dicevano: « Dopo che saremo morti e ridotti in polvere ed ossa, saremo forse resuscitati?
null.verse 56:51: E [così pure] i nostri avi?»
null.verse 56:52: Di': « In verità sia i primi che gli ultimi
null.verse 56:53: saranno riuniti nel convegno del Giorno stabilito»
null.verse 56:54: Quindi in verità voi traviati, voi negatori,
null.verse 56:55: mangerete dall'albero Zaqqum ,
null.verse 56:56: ve ne riempirete il ventre,
null.verse 56:57: e ci berrete sopra acqua bollente,
null.verse 56:58: berrete come cammelli morenti di sete.
null.verse 56:59: Ecco cosa sarà offerto loro nel Giorno del Giudizio.
null.verse 56:60: Siamo Noi che vi abbiamo creato.
null.verse 56:61: Non riflettete su quello che eiaculate:
null.verse 56:62: siete forse voi a crearlo o siamo Noi il Creatore?
null.verse 56:63: Abbiamo decretato per voi la morte e non potremo essere sopravanzati
null.verse 56:64: nel sostituirvi con altri simili a voi e nel farvi rinascere [in forme] che ancora non conoscete .
null.verse 56:65: Già conoscete la prima creazione! Perché non ve ne ricordate?
null.verse 56:66: Non riflettete su quello che coltivate:
null.verse 56:67: siete voi a seminare o siamo Noi i Seminatori?
null.verse 56:68: Certamente se volessimo ne faremmo paglia secca e allora stupireste [e direste]:
null.verse 56:69: « Siamo oberati di debiti,
null.verse 56:70: del tutto diseredati! ».
null.verse 56:71: Non riflettete sull'acqua che bevete:
null.verse 56:72: siete forse voi a farla scendere dalla nuvola o siamo Noi che la facciamo scendere?
null.verse 56:73: Se volessimo la renderemmo salmastra: perché mai non siete riconoscenti?
null.verse 56:74: Non riflettete sul fuoco che ottenete sfregando,
null.verse 56:75: siete stati voi a far crescere l'albero [che lo alimenta] o siamo stati Noi?
null.verse 56:76: Ne abbiamo fatto un monito e un'utilità per i viaggiatori del deserto .
null.verse 56:77: Glorifica dunque il Nome del tuo Signore, il Supremo!
null.verse 56:78: Lo giuro per il declino delle stelle
null.verse 56:79: - e questo è giuramento solenne, se lo sapeste -
null.verse 56:80: che questo è in verità un Corano nobilissimo,
null.verse 56:82: in un Libro custodito
null.verse 56:83: che solo i puri toccano .
null.verse 56:84: E' una Rivelazione del Signore dei mondi.
null.verse 56:85: Di questo discorso vorreste sospettare?
null.verse 56:86: La vostra riconoscenza sarà tacciarlo di menzogna?
null.verse 56:87: Perché mai, quando
null.verse 56:88: risale alla gola
null.verse 56:89: sotto i vostri occhi,
null.verse 56:90: e Noi gli siamo più vicini, ma non ve ne accorgete,
null.verse 56:91: perché mai, se non dovete essere giudicati
null.verse 56:92: e se siete sinceri, non la ricondurrete ?
null.verse 56:93: Se [il morente] fa parte dei ravvicinati [ad Allah],
null.verse 56:94: avrà riposo, profumi e un Giardino di delizie.
null.verse 56:95: Se è stato uno dei compagni della destra,
null.verse 56:96: [gli sarà detto:] « Pace da parte dei compagni della destra!»
null.verse 56:97: Ma se è stato uno di quelli che tacciavano di menzogna e che si erano traviati,
null.verse 56:101: Rendi dunque gloria al Nome del tuo Signore, il Supremo!

null.verse 56:2: （誰も）その起るのを，嘘であるとしなくなる。
null.verse 56:3: （或る者は）低く落され，（或る者は）高く挙げられよう。
null.verse 56:4: その時，大地は大揺れに揺れる。
null.verse 56:5: 山々は砕けて崩れ，
null.verse 56:6: 粉粉になって飛散する。
null.verse 56:7: その時あなたがたは，3つの組に分けられる。
null.verse 56:8: まず右手の仲間（がいる）。右手の仲間とは何であろう。
null.verse 56:9: また左手の仲間（がいる）。左手の仲間とは何であろう。
null.verse 56:10: （信仰の）先頭に立つ者は，（楽園においても）先頭に立ち，
null.verse 56:11: これらの者（先頭に立つ者）は，（アッラーの）側近にはべり，
null.verse 56:12: 至福の楽園の中に（住む）。
null.verse 56:14: 後世の者は僅かである。
null.verse 56:15: （かれらは錦の織物を）敷いた寝床の上に，
null.verse 56:16: 向い合ってそれに寄り� かる。
null.verse 56:17: 永遠の（若さを保つ）少年たちがかれらの間を巡り，
null.verse 56:18: （手に手に）高坏や（輝く）水差し，汲立の飲物盃（を捧げる）。
null.verse 56:19: かれらは，それで後の障を残さず，泥酔することもない。
null.verse 56:20: また果実は，かれらの選ぶに任せ，
null.verse 56:21: 種々の鳥の肉は，かれらの好みのまま。
null.verse 56:22: 大きい輝くまなざしの，美しい乙女は，
null.verse 56:23: 丁度秘蔵の真珠のよう。
null.verse 56:24: （これらは）かれらの行いに対する報奨である。
null.verse 56:25: そこでは，無益な言葉や，罪作りな話も聞くことはない。
null.verse 56:26: 只「平安あれ，平安あれ。」と言う（のを耳にする）だけである。
null.verse 56:27: 右手の仲間，右手の仲間とは何であろう。
null.verse 56:28: （かれらは）刺のないスィドラの木，
null.verse 56:29: 累々と実るタルフ木（の中に住み），
null.verse 56:31: 絶え間なく流れる水の間で，
null.verse 56:33: 絶えることなく，禁じられることもなく（取り放題）。
null.verse 56:34: 高く上げられた（位階の）臥所に（着く）。
null.verse 56:35: 本当にわれは，かれら（の配偶として乙女）を特別に創り，
null.verse 56:36: かの女らを（永遠に汚れない）処女にした。
null.verse 56:38: （これらは）右手の仲間のためである。
null.verse 56:39: 昔の者が大勢いるが，
null.verse 56:41: 左手の仲間，かれらは何であろう。
null.verse 56:42: （かれらは）焼け焦がすような風と，煮え立つ湯の中，
null.verse 56:44: 涼しくもなく，爽やかでもない（中にいる）。
null.verse 56:45: かれらはそれ以前，裕福で（享楽に耽り）。
null.verse 56:46: 大罪を敢て犯していた。
null.verse 56:47: そして何時も言っていた。「わたしたちは死んでから，土と骨になり，本当に甦されるのでしょうか。
null.verse 56:48: わたしたちの古い祖先も（甦されるの）ですか。」
null.verse 56:49: 言ってやるがいい。「そうだとも，昔の者も後世の者も。
null.verse 56:50: 必ず一緒に召集されるのである。定められた日の，定められた時に。」
null.verse 56:51: その時あなたがたは（どうであろう），迷って（真理を）虚偽であるとした者よ。
null.verse 56:52: 必ずあなたがたはザックームの木（の実）を食べ，
null.verse 56:53: それで腹は一杯。
null.verse 56:54: その上煮え立つ湯を飲む，
null.verse 56:55: 喉が乾いたラクダが飲むように。
null.verse 56:56: これが審きの日の，かれらの持て成しである。
null.verse 56:57: われはあなたがたを創った。あなたがたはどうして真実を信じようとしないのか。
null.verse 56:58: あなたがたは，あなたがたの射出するもの（精液）に就いて考えたか。
null.verse 56:59: それを創ったのはあなたがたなのか，それともわれがその創造者であるのか。
null.verse 56:60: われは，あなたがたに死（期）を定めた。われは，（決して）出し抜かれたりすることはない。
null.verse 56:61: だがわれは同類の者で取り替え（世代の交替），またはあなたがたが知らない（他の形態の）ものに，あなたがたを創（り変え）る。
null.verse 56:62: あなたがたは，確かに最初の創造を知っている。それでも何故留意しないのか。
null.verse 56:63: あなたがたは，あなたがたが耕す（畑の）ことを考えたか。
null.verse 56:64: あなたがたがそれ（植物）を育てるのか，それともわれが育てるのか。
null.verse 56:65: もしわれが欲するならば，それを枯れた屑にしてしまう。あなたがたは驚愕して止まない。
null.verse 56:66: （そして言うであろう。）「わたしたちは本当に負債を課せられた。
null.verse 56:67: いや，わたしたちは（労働の成果を）取り上げられた。」
null.verse 56:68: またあなたがたの飲む水に就いて考えたか。
null.verse 56:69: あなたがたが雲から（雨を）降らせるのか，それともわれが降らせるのか。
null.verse 56:70: われがもし欲するならば，それを塩辛くすることが出来る。あなたがたはどうして感謝しないのか。
null.verse 56:71: あなたがたは，灯火に就いて考えたか。
null.verse 56:72: その（燃やす）木を，あなたがたが創ったのか，それともわれが創ったのか。
null.verse 56:73: われはそれを教訓とし，また荒野の住民の便利のために創った。
null.verse 56:74: だから偉大であられるあなたの主の御名を讃えなさい。
null.verse 56:75: わたしは，沈んでゆく星にかけて誓う。
null.verse 56:76: それは本当に偉大な誓いである。もしあなたがたに分るならば，
null.verse 56:77: 本当にこれは，非常に尊いクルアーンである。
null.verse 56:78: （それは）秘蔵の啓典の中に（書かれてあり），
null.verse 56:79: 清められた者の外，触れることが出来ない。
null.verse 56:80: 万有の主からの啓示である。
null.verse 56:81: これは，あなたがたが軽んじるような教えであろうか。
null.verse 56:82: またあなたがたは（それを）虚偽であると申し立て，あなたがたの暮らしを立てるのか。
null.verse 56:83: それならあなたがたは，（臨終の人の魂が）喉もとを塞ぐ時，
null.verse 56:84: （座って只）見守るばかりなのか。
null.verse 56:85: われはあなたがたよりもかれに近いのである。だがあなたがたには見えはしない。
null.verse 56:86: あなたがたがもし（来世の）報いを除外されているというのなら，あなたがたは何故，
null.verse 56:87: その（魂）を（体内に）呼び戻さないのか。もしあなたがたが，真実（を語っているの）ならば。
null.verse 56:88: もしかれが，（アッラー）に近付けられた者であるなら，
null.verse 56:89: （かれに対する報奨は）安心と満悦，そして至福の楽園である。
null.verse 56:90: もしかれが，右手の仲間であるならば，
null.verse 56:91: 「あなたに平安あれ。」と右手の仲間から（挨拶される）。
null.verse 56:92: もしかれが，嘘付きで，迷った者であるならば，
null.verse 56:93: 煮え立つ湧の待遇を受け，
null.verse 56:95: 本当にこれは，揺ぎのない確かな真理である。
null.verse 56:96: だから偉大であられるあなたの主の御名を讃えなさい。 本当にこれは，揺ぎのない確かな真理である。

null.verse 56:2: 그것이 오는 것에 대하여 어 느 누구도 거짓이라 하지 못하며
null.verse 56:3: 어떤 무리는 굴욕을 받을 것이 요 어떤 무리는 찬양을 받으리라
null.verse 56:4: 그때 대지가 깊숙이 흔들릴 것이요
null.verse 56:5: 산들은 산산조각이 나며
null.verse 56:6: 먼지가 되어 산산히 흩어지니라
null.verse 56:7: 그리고 너희는 세 무리로 분 류되나니
null.verse 56:8: 그 중 하나는 우편의 동료가 될 것이라 너희는 우편의 동료가 무엇인지 아느뇨
null.verse 56:9: 그리고 좌편의 동료가 될 것 이라 너희는 좌편의 동료가 무엇 인지 아느뇨
null.verse 56:10: 앞서는 자가 될 것이라 너 희는 앞서는 자에 대하여 아느뇨
null.verse 56:15: 그들은 금으로 장식된 금좌 에 앉아
null.verse 56:16: 서로가 서로에게 얼굴을 마 주보며 기대니
null.verse 56:17: 영원히 사는 소년들이 그들 주위를 돌며
null.verse 56:18: 술잔과 주전자와 깨끗한 물 그리고 가득찬 잔들로 봉사하더라
null.verse 56:19: 그것으로 그들은 두통을 앓 지도 취하지도 아니하며
null.verse 56:20: 그들은 취향에 따라 과일을 선택하노라
null.verse 56:21: 그들이 원하는 조류의 고기 를 즐기며
null.verse 56:22: 눈이 크고 아름다운 배우자 가 있으매
null.verse 56:24: 이것들은 그들이 행한 것에 대한 보상이라
null.verse 56:25: 그들은 그곳에서 무익하고 욕된 말들을 듣지 아니하며
null.verse 56:27: 우편의 동료가 있나니 너희 는 우편의 동료에 대하여 아느뇨
null.verse 56:28: 그들은 가시가 없는 시드라 나무 가운데 있을 것이며
null.verse 56:29: 송이송이 열매 맺힌 딸하 나 무 가운데 있노라
null.verse 56:33: 계절에 제한받지 않는 것들 이라
null.verse 56:35: 하나님은 그들을 위해 새로 운 배우자들을 두시고
null.verse 56:39: 그 곳에는 옛 선조들도 많으 며
null.verse 56:41: 좌편의 동료가 있나니 너희는좌편의 동료가 무엇인지 아느뇨
null.verse 56:42: 그들은 작열하는 볼지옥과 들끓는 물속에 있게 되고
null.verse 56:44: 시원한 것도 즐길 수 없노라
null.verse 56:45: 이는 그들이 이전에 재물과 사치에 탐닉하여
null.verse 56:46: 크게 사악하고 오만하였으며
null.verse 56:47: 죽어 흙이되어 뼈만 남는 우 리가 다시 부활한단 말이뇨 라고 말하였더라
null.verse 56:48: 우리 선조들도 그렇단 말이 요 라고 말했더라
null.verse 56:49: 일러가로되 그러하니라 옛 선조들도 그리고 후세의 사람들도
null.verse 56:50: 모두가 잘 알려진 어떤 날 상봉을 위하여 다같이 모이니
null.verse 56:51: 방황하고 거짓했던 자들이여
null.verse 56:52: 너희는 자꿈나무를 맛보리 라
null.verse 56:53: 그때 너희 배들은 그것으로 부풀어 오르고
null.verse 56:54: 그 위로 들끓는 물을 마시매
null.verse 56:55: 갈증에 허덕이는 낙타가 마 시는 것과 같더라
null.verse 56:56: 그러함이 그들이 받을 보상 의 날 대접이라
null.verse 56:57: 하나님이 너희를 창조하였으 되 너희는 그 진리를 믿으려 하지 않느뇨
null.verse 56:58: 너희는 인간의 정액을 생각해 보았느뇨
null.verse 56:59: 그것은 너희가 창조한 것이뇨아니면 하나님이 창조한 것이뇨
null.verse 56:60: 하나님은 너희 가운데 누구 에게라도 죽음을 이르게 할 수 있 으되 좌절하지 아니하며
null.verse 56:61: 너희의 양상을 바꾸어 너희 가 알지 못하는 양상으로 너희를 재창조 하시니라
null.verse 56:62: 너희는 최초의 창조를 알고 있으면서 그것을 교훈으로 삼지 않느뇨
null.verse 56:63: 너희가 땅에 심는 씨앗을 보 지 아니 했느뇨
null.verse 56:64: 너희가 그것을 자라게 하느 뇨 아니면 하나님이 성장케 하느 뇨
null.verse 56:65: 하나님이 원한다면 그분은 그것을 산산조각으로 만드시니라 그때 너희는 비탄에 빠지며
null.verse 56:67: 모든 것이 헛되었도다 라고 말할 것이라
null.verse 56:68: 너희는 너희가 마시는 물을 생각하여 보았느뇨
null.verse 56:69: 너희가 비를 내리게 하느뇨 아니면 하나님이 비를 내리게 하 느뇨
null.verse 56:70: 하나님이 원했다면 그분은 그것을 짜게 하셨으리라 그래도 너희는 감사하려 하지 않느뇨
null.verse 56:71: 너희가 킨 불을 생각하여 보았느뇨
null.verse 56:72: 불을 켜기위해 나무를 심은 자가 너희이뇨 아니면 하나님이 그것을 성장케 하느뇨
null.verse 56:73: 하나님은 그것으로 교훈이 되게 하였고 여행자들에게 유용 하도록 하였노라
null.verse 56:74: 그러므로 위대한 그대 주님 의 이름으로 찬미하라
null.verse 56:75: 실로 지는 별들을 두고 맹 세하나니
null.verse 56:76: 너희가 알고만 있다면 실로 이것은 하나의 위대한 맹세로
null.verse 56:79: 청결한 자 외에는 아무도 스치지 아니한
null.verse 56:80: 만유의 주님으로부터 계시된 것이라
null.verse 56:81: 그래도 너희는 이 말씀을 조롱하느뇨
null.verse 56:82: 너희의 양식으로 감사하지 아니하고 불신하려 하느뇨
null.verse 56:83: 너희의 영혼이 목까지 이를 때
null.verse 56:84: 그때 너희는 지켜 보리라
null.verse 56:85: 하나님이 그것 가까이 있으 되 너희가 알지 못하노라
null.verse 56:86: 너희가 주장했듯 계산을 받 지 아니하고
null.verse 56:87: 너희가 진실이라면 그 영혼 을 불러오지 못하느뇨
null.verse 56:88: 그러나 하나님 가까이 있는 자를 위해
null.verse 56:89: 행복과 풍성함과 축복받은 천국이 그를 위해 있노라
null.verse 56:90: 우편의 동료들 중에 있다면
null.verse 56:91: 우편의 동료들로부터 평안하소서 라는 인사를 받을 것이며
null.verse 56:92: 거역하여 방황하는 자 중에 있다면
null.verse 56:93: 그는 들끓는 물을 마시며
null.verse 56:95: 실로 이것이 진리요 참이니
null.verse 56:96: 위대하신 그대 주님의 이름 으로 찬미하라

null.verse 56:2: روودانی ئه‌و کاره‌ساته‌حه‌قیقه‌ته و که‌س ناتوانێت بڕوای پێی نه‌بێت و به‌ڕاستی نه‌زانێت
null.verse 56:3: نزم که‌ره‌وه‌یه‌و به‌رزکه‌ره‌وه‌، (ئیمانداران به‌رزو پایه‌دار ده‌بن، خوانه‌ناسانیش سه‌رشۆڕ و ڕیسوا)
null.verse 56:4: کاتێک زه‌وی ده‌شڵه‌قێت و به‌توندی ده‌له‌رزێت
null.verse 56:5: کێوه‌کانیش وردوخاش ده‌بن (ته‌خت و ساف ده‌بن، به‌رزیه‌کان، نشێوه‌کان پڕ ده‌که‌ن)
null.verse 56:6: ده‌بنه‌ته‌پوتۆزێکی په‌رش و بڵاو (زه‌ویان پێ ته‌خت و ڕێک ده‌کرێت)
null.verse 56:7: ئه‌و کاته‌ئێوه ده‌بنه‌سێ ده‌سته‌وه‌
null.verse 56:8: ده‌سته‌ی ڕاستیان ده‌رده‌که‌ون، جا چووزانی ئه‌وانه‌له‌چ خۆشیه‌کدان؟!
null.verse 56:9: هه‌روه‌ها ده‌سته‌ی چه‌پ و لارو وێره‌کانیش، ئای ئه‌و شوومانه‌له‌چ سه‌رگه‌ردانه‌کدان؟!
null.verse 56:10: (ده‌سته‌ی سێهه‌م) پێشکه‌وتووه‌کانن، ئه‌وانه‌ن که‌پێشکه‌وتوون له‌به‌ده‌ستهێنانی ڕه‌زامه‌ندی خوادا
null.verse 56:13: ده‌سته‌یه‌کی زۆریان له‌وان که‌زوو چوون به‌ده‌م بانگه‌وازی خواوه‌
null.verse 56:14: ده‌سته‌یه‌کی که‌میشیان له‌وانه‌ن که‌دواتر (به‌شوێن ئه‌واندا ڕێبازی ئیمانیان گرته‌به‌ر)
null.verse 56:15: له‌سه‌ر کورسی و قه‌نه‌فه‌ی نه‌خشدارو چنراو به‌ئاڵتون دانیشتوون
null.verse 56:16: شانیان داداوه‌له‌سه‌ر کورسیه‌کان به‌رامبه‌ر به‌یه‌ک، دیاره که‌له‌بۆنه‌ی تایبه‌تیدا که‌هه‌میشه‌، له‌به‌هه‌شتدا به‌رده‌وامه‌ئیماندارن پێک شاد ده‌بن
null.verse 56:17: لاوانی جوان و ئێسک سووک و نه‌مر به‌ده‌وریاندا دێن وخزمه‌تیان ده‌که‌ن و هه‌میشه گه‌نجن و پیرنابن
null.verse 56:18: به‌کوپ و دۆڵکه و سوراحیه‌وه ده‌گه‌ڕێن و له‌په‌رداخی تایبه‌تدا جۆره‌ها شه‌ربه‌ت و شه‌راب و خواردنه‌وه‌ی به‌تام و خۆشیان پێشکه‌ش ده‌که‌ن که‌له‌سه‌رچاوه‌یه‌کی ڕه‌وانه‌وه‌پڕ ده‌کرێن
null.verse 56:19: ئه‌و شه‌رابانه‌نه‌سه‌ریان پێی دێته ئێش و نه‌سه‌رخۆش ده‌بن
null.verse 56:20: میوه‌شیان بۆ ده‌گێڕن، به‌ئاره‌زووی خۆیان لێی هه‌ڵده‌بژێرن
null.verse 56:21: گۆشتی هه‌ر باڵنده‌یه‌کیش که‌حه‌زی لێ بکه‌ن بۆتان ئاماده‌یه‌

null.verse 56:24: له‌پاداشتی کاروکره‌وه‌ی چاکیانداکه ده‌یانکرد.
null.verse 56:25: هیچ جۆره قسه‌یه‌کی نابه‌جێ ونادروست و ناڕێک نابیستن و یه‌کتریش گوناهبار ناکه‌ن
null.verse 56:26: جگه‌له‌وتنی سڵاو و وه‌ڵامدانه‌وه و قسه‌ی خۆش نه‌بێت
null.verse 56:27: ده‌سته‌ی ڕاسته‌کانیش، جا چووزانێ که‌ئه‌وانیش له‌چ خۆشیه‌کدان

null.verse 56:30: له‌ژێر سێبه‌ری دوورو درێژدان له‌و باخه‌خۆشانه‌دا
null.verse 56:31: تاڤگه‌ی جوان و حه‌وز و فواره‌ی ڕازاوه‌ی تێدایه‌

null.verse 56:37: هاوسه‌ره‌کانیان زۆرخۆش ده‌وێت و هه‌موویان هاو ته‌مه‌نن

null.verse 56:41: له‌ولاشه‌وه‌ده‌سته‌ی چه‌په‌کان، قوڕبه‌سه‌ریان، بۆ بارو دۆخچک که‌تێی که‌وتوون

null.verse 56:47: هه‌میشه ده‌یانوت: ئایا کاتێک ئێمه مردین و بووینه خاک و ئێسقان ئێمه زیندووده‌کرێینه‌وه؟!
null.verse 56:49: ئه‌ی پێغه‌مبه‌ر (صلی الله علیه وسلم) پێیان بڵێ: بێگومان پێشینان و پاشینان هه‌رهه‌موویان
null.verse 56:50: کۆ ده‌کرێنه‌وه و ڕاپێچ ده‌کرێن به‌ره‌و مه‌یدانی ڕۆژی دیاری کراو
null.verse 56:51: پاشان بێگومان ئێوه ئه‌ی گومڕاو بێ باوه‌ڕان ئه‌ی ئه‌وانه‌ی که‌باوه‌ڕتان به‌ڕاستیه‌کان نیه‌

null.verse 56:55: هه‌ر وه‌کو ئه‌و حوشترانه‌ی به‌هۆی نه‌خۆشیه‌کی تایبه‌تیه‌وه تێر ئاو نابن

null.verse 56:57: ئێمه دروستمان کردوون ده‌بۆچی بڕوا ناکه‌ن؟!
null.verse 56:58: جا پێم بڵێن ئه‌و مه‌نی یه‌ی که‌له‌جێی خۆیدا دایده‌نێن؟ (چیه و چۆنه؟ له‌م سه‌رده‌مه‌دا زانستی هه‌ندێک نهێنیه‌کانی ڕوون کردۆته‌وه‌، که‌چۆن له‌نێوان ملیۆنه‌هادا به‌ویستی خوا یه‌ک دانه‌ی یه‌ک ده‌گرێت له‌گه‌ڵ هێلکۆکه‌یه‌کدا له‌سه‌ره‌تای دروستبوونی ئاده‌میزاد)
null.verse 56:59: ئایا ئێوه دروستی ده‌که‌ن یان ئێمه به‌دیهێنه‌رین؟!
null.verse 56:60: ئێمه نه‌خشه‌ی مردنمان له‌نێوانتاندا بڕیار داوه‌، که‌س ده‌سه‌ڵاتی پێش ئێمه نه‌که‌وتووه‌و بێ تواناش نین.
null.verse 56:61: که‌له‌شوێنی ئێوه نه‌وه‌ی تر بهێنین و بیخه‌ینه شوێنتان، یاخود سه‌رله‌نوێ له‌رێگه‌یه‌که‌وه که‌نایزانن دروستتان بکه‌ینه‌وه‌
null.verse 56:62: سوێند به‌خوا خۆ ئه‌وه‌ته‌بوونی سه‌ره‌تاو یه‌که‌م جارتان زانیووه‌و به‌چاوی خۆتان بینیووتانه چۆن په‌یداده‌بن، که‌واته‌بۆچی یاداوه‌ری وه‌رناگرن و بیر ناکه‌نه‌وه‌؟!
null.verse 56:63: ئایا سه‌رنجتانداوه‌له‌و زه‌ویه‌ی که‌ده‌یکێڵن و ده‌یچێنن؟
null.verse 56:64: ئایا ئێوه ده‌یڕوێنن، یان هه‌ر ئێمه‌ین ڕوێنه‌ر و به‌رهه‌م هێنه‌ر
null.verse 56:65: ئایا ئێوه ده‌یڕوێنن، یان هه‌ر ئێمه‌ین ڕوێنه‌ر و به‌رهه‌م هێنه‌ر
null.verse 56:66: به‌خه‌فه‌ت و په‌ژاره‌وه‌ده‌ڵێن: به‌ڕاسته زه‌ره‌ری چاکمان کرد، ڕه‌نجه‌ڕۆ خۆمان
